head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BLANKLEY, THOMAS S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BLANKLEY, THOMAS S.

block.p: BLANKLEY--Thomas S., 87, on April 2, 2007, in Ponte Vedra Beach, FL. Born in Brooklyn, NY, to Adele and Schuyler Blankley; proud alumnus of Poly Prep 1938 and Dartmouth College 1942; WWII AAC veteran; retired American Home Products Corp., 1976; resident of Garden City, NY, Southold, NY, and Ponte Vedra Beach, FL. Devoted husband of Susanne. Loved father of Mary, Barbara, and Thomas Jr. Loving brother of Janet Blankley Crawford. Sailor, Golfer, Gentleman.
